General.Name: Bolsa de Comercio de Santiago Bolsa de Valores
General.Description: Bolsa de Comercio de Santiago, Bolsa de Valores operates as a securities exchange that provides services to financial market players in Chile. The company offers financial instrument trading products and services; front, middle, and back office technological solutions for institutions and market investors; and stock market information services for trading financial instruments. It is also involved in the provision of administration of ETFs; and office rental, training, and website advertising services. In addition, the company offers over the counter and derivatives market negotiation and consultation products and services; and stock market listing and post trading services. Bolsa de Comercio de Santiago, Bolsa de Valores was founded in 1893 and is headquartered in Santiago, Chile.
